points.title: Divine Origin
points.description: The Sudarshan Chakra was forged by Vishwakarma, the divine architect, from the dust of the sun.

points.title: Cosmic Power
points.description: With 108 serrated edges, the chakra represents the 108 elements that constitute the material universe.

points.title: Eternal Motion
points.description: The chakra spins perpetually, symbolizing the eternal nature of time and cosmic order (Dharma).

points.title: Time Mastery
points.description: Sudarshan Chakra represents Lord Vishnu's mastery over time itself, cutting through past, present, and future.

points.title: Divine Justice
points.description: The chakra serves as an instrument of divine justice, protecting dharma and destroying adharma.
